entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 a.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in open areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
